LanguageData.star_mucus.label: star mucus
LanguageData.star_mucus.description: A stellar mucous membrane from a stellar host. But I don't know if this is the mucous membrane of a star... Yes, no one knows.
LanguageData.star_WoodLog.label: star remnant
LanguageData.star_WoodLog.description: They are a kind of steel flesh that came from disassembling the forces of the stars.
LanguageData.Geschpenst_Core.label: Geschpenst's Core
LanguageData.Geschpenst_Core.description: A core from a Geschpenst watcher that beats like a living heart.
LanguageData.bailiff_stone.label: bailiff stone
LanguageData.bailiff_stone.description: As if regenerating energy with a stone that emits unknown energy from the executor's body, it rotates infinitely.
LanguageData.ghost_tree.label: Pathfinder Seed
LanguageData.ghost_tree.description: It is a seed that radiates unknown energy.
LanguageData.Plant_star_fruit.label: star fruit
LanguageData.Plant_star_fruit.description: It is a small fruit tree that grows on the guide of the stars.
